div.p: This case-sensitive code system https://voicecollab.ai/fhir/CodeSystem/neuro-participation-consent defines the following codes:

tr.td: I consent to continue my participation in this study.
I DO NOT consent to continue my participation in this study but consent to keep the data collected up to this time

description.value: The codes required for neuro consent

display.value: I consent to continue my participation in this study.
I DO NOT consent to continue my participation in this study but consent to keep the data collected up to this time
